page.title: 01POPULATION OF SHELDON
page.content: IN AND AROUND SHELDON THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY ONE HUNDRED PEOPLE.EIGHTY ACTUALY LIVE IN THE VILLAGE.SIX ARE PRE-SCHOOL AGE.FOURTEEN ARE AT SCHOOL BETWEEN THE AGES OF FIVE AND SIXTEEN.FIFTEEN ARE OVER SIXTY.MAINLY THE WORKFORCE ARE FARMERS.ALTHOUGH THERE IS A MIXTURE OF PROFESSIONS AS PEOPLE MOVE IN TO THE VILLAGE e.g. LECTURERS,MECHANICS,BUILDERS,JOINERS etc. .ALTHOUGH UNEMPLOYMENT IS AT A PEAK WE ONLY HAVE ONE PERSON UNABLE TO OBTAIN A JOB.WE HAVE A SHORT-AGE OF CHILDREN IN THE VILLAGE.DEATHS OF THE AGED THIS YEAR IS HIGH FOR SHELDON AS WE HAVE LOST THREE ALL NAMED BROCKLEHURST.
